title: George Katrib
text:
George Katrib is an Australian former <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="Lebanon%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Lebanon</a> at the <a href="2000%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2000 Rugby League World Cup</a>.
Background.
Katrib was born in <a href="Sydney">Sydney</a>, <a href="New%20South%20Wales">New South Wales</a>, Australia.
Playing career.
From the <a href="Sydney%20Bulls">Sydney Bulls</a>, Katrib was selected for <a href="Lebanon%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Lebanon</a>'s <a href="2000%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2000 World Cup</a> squad. He started the first match at centre and was one of three players requiring medical treatment for hypothermia after the match due to the poor weather in Gloucester. He missed the second match due to a knee injury, playing in the third match from the bench.
